member.summary: Custom properties

member.summary: Draws all visible tile layers

Region of the map in pixels to draw

Region of the map in pixels to draw

member.summary: Draws all visible tile layers
member.param: XNA SpriteBatch instance; SpriteBatch.Begin() must be called before using this method
Region of the map in pixels to draw
If true, draws layers regardless of TileLayer.Visible flag

member.summary: Draws all visible tile layers

Region of the map in pixels to draw

Index of the layer to draw in the Map.TileLayers collection

LayerDepth value to pass to SpriteBatch
